# Welcome!

I am Hugo, a life science researcher and R programmer. I hold a PhD
in developmental immunology from Lund Stem Cell Center, Sweden. I combine a strong
understanding of **wet lab** science with a passion for **R programming**. 

I use my *bilingual* skill set to develop tools, explore data, and generate visualization
that lie close to the needs and expectations of life science researchers. 

Learn more about my approach to R progamming over on my [blog](../blog), 
explore my data visualization under [TidyTuesday contributions](../tidytuesday),
or read up on my [R package for flow cytometry analysis](/r_packages).
:::
